step_data.thought:
I'm now on the customer grid page. My goal is to configure the customer grid to display only Name, Email, and Phone columns. Currently, the grid is showing many columns: ID, Name, Email, Group, Phone, ZIP, Country, State/Province, Customer Since, Web Site, Confirmed email, Account Created in, Date of Birth, Tax VAT Number, Gender, and Action.

To configure the columns, I need to use the 'Columns' button which allows me to select which columns to display. I can see this button in the UI with the text '\ue610 Columns'.
